text: Julie E. "Tawny" Kitaen (August 5, 1961 â€“ May 7, 2021) was an American actress, model, comedian, and media personality. She was known for her role as Debbie Thompson in the 1984 comedy Bachelor Party. On May 7, 2021, Kitaen died at her Newport Beach, California home at the age of 59. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Television personalities from California Category:Models from San Diego Category:Actors from San Diego Category:Comedians from San Diego Category:People with dyslexia
